function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Close proximity between organizations facilitating the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographical proximity between companies in the same supply chain favoring the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaunch of territories’ economies depending on the indirect effects of the knowledge economy from a proximity perspective.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proximity trade involving retail sale of products within a contained area could facilitate the spread of contagious diseases due to the close proximity of customers and employees.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased population density in urban areas due to neighborhood development","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to essential services within a short distance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on local businesses and trade for essential services","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagious diseases propagation in the built environment due to urban policies and proximity perspectives","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on real estate sector in turkey","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effects of social distancing on tourism, retail, and manufacturing sectors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited support measures for entrepreneurs with leased properties","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High risk of economic loss due to prolonged closure of retail sales","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of permanent closure of small businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of continued economic decline in service and entertainment sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in employment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collapse in retail sales","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in remote working","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global recession impacting growth prospects","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruptions in industrial manufacturing and drop in commodity prices","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Amplification of social, spatial, and economic inequalities due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of the infection in extensively urbanized areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of unreliable information during health crisis situations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption to the continuity of essential services after a crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective recognition of the gravity of crisis situations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate coordination and distribution of essential resources leading to uneven healthcare support","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Divergent interests of stakeholders affecting coordination and communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of dependencies and interdependencies among stakeholders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information on virus and its impacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shortages of health equipment and critical components","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and allocation of responsibilities between agencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intense threat and surprise during defensive phase","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Constraints in communication during crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need to restore confidence among stakeholders in consolidation phase","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Marginalisation of vulnerability in risk assessment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Narrow focus on common threats and exclusion of interdependencies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of advance preparation for backup sources and inventory buffers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of robustness in critical infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of redundancy in critical infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resourcefulness in crisis management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of rapidity in restoring functionality after a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contradictory definitions of resilience may lead to confusion and inefficiency in implementation of resilience measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of full incorporation of resilience-based approach into eu and national frameworks may result in inadequate protection of critical infrastructure.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contradictory understanding of resilience may hinder the achievement of disaster risk reduction and climate change adaptation objectives.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overreliance on prevention as a method for mitigating contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overestimation of contingency planning","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Narrow focus on building barriers and fortification strategies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of business continuity planning for critical infrastructure operators","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to prevent cascading crises in high complexity systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Barriers to preventing threats to critical infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Supply chain disruption due to shipping delays, gaps in preparedness, and logistical bottlenecks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
